channel.title: Slightly-Mad Science
channel.description: Home of Dangerously-Stupid Science Demonstrations and Makers of Things 'Splodey!
channel.itunes:summary: Mad-science themed video podcast. Most videos deal with topics found in Physics and Chemistry. Sometimes updated with silly non-science content..

item.title: Valentine's Jacob's Ladder
item.description: Heart-Shaped Jacob's Ladder made prior to Valentine's Day.

item.title: Plasma Bulb Demonstrations
item.description: Demonstration of what happens if you take an ordinary light bulb and add 15,000 volts from a neon transformer.

item.title: Will It Blend Parody - Will it burn? Mac vs Pc
item.description: Parody of Blendtec's popular "Will It Blend?" series.

item.title: Dangers of Electricity
item.description: My demonstrations are of the "don't try this at home" variety. This video illustrates why.

item.title: Lightning Hands Demo
item.description: 15,000 volts between my fingers. Bad time to pick my nose.

item.title: Doll Death: Slain By Solvent Science!
item.description: Barbie and Bratz dolls meet solvents Acetone and Xylene.

item.title: Breaking Flaming Boards and the Leidenfrost Effect
item.description: Using the Leidenfrost effect to protect myself when breaking fiery boards.

item.title: Physics of Breaking Stuff
item.description: Chop-Socky Science! The physics behind how karate blows break things.

item.title: Adopt A Troll (parody)
item.description: The tragedy has gone on long enough. I must do something. Be sarcastic?

item.title: High Voltage Antique
item.description: Oudin coil made in the 1920's demonstrated.

item.title: How to Slightly-Mad Wrap a Gift (prank)
item.description: Devious gift giving prank using spray foam.

item.title: Potential Energy
item.description: The physics principle of Potential Energy demonstrated.

item.title: Huffing (sarcasm)
item.description: The dangerous effects of inhaling solvents.

item.title: Magnesium and the Attack of the Memes!
item.description: Magnesium made 'splodey and mixed up parodies of 2007 Internet Memes.
